# Keywords

Keywords describes the different types of keywords available to all cards found in rule text.

# Keywords Structure

PropertyTypeExampleDescription
AbilityWordsarray(string)[..."undergrowth"...]List of ability words found in rules text on cards.
KeywordAbilitiesarray(string)[..."convoke"...]List of keyword abilities found in rules text on cards.
KeywordActionsarray(string)[..."surveil"...]List of keyword actions found in rules text on cards.
